query cartRules {
    cartRules {

            id

            description
            startsFrom
            endsTill
            status
            couponType

            usesPerCoupon

                theme

                    id
                    name
                    code
                    direction
                }

                    id
                    name
                    code
                    symbol
                }

                    id
                    code
                    name
                    description
                    contactName
                    contactEmail
                    contactNumber
                    contactFax
                    country
                    state
                    city
                    street
                    postcode
                    priority
                    latitude
                    longitude
                    status
                }
                baseCurrency
                rootCategory
                logoUrl
                faviconUrl
            }
            cartRuleCustomerGroups {
                id
                name
                code
                isUserDefined
                createdAt
                updatedAt
            }
            cartRuleCoupon {
                id
                code
                usageLimit
                usagePerCustomer
                isPrimary
                timesUsed
                expiredAt
                type
                cartRuleId
                createdAt
                updatedAt

}
